attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for anyone who lives in, travels to and from and in concerned with transport in the town of Crumlin, County Antrim, Northern Ireland.
As of recent years the train service has not passed through the town causing many people disruption.
The bus services aren't enough and if the trains were brought back then it would be of great convenience to many people in the surrounding areas.
I urge Translink to do something about this.
If you wish to contact translink here is their website : http://www.translink.co.uk/
Contact me on : dangerlineproductions@gmail.com
Thank you for your support

rejection.details: This is an issue for the Northern Ireland Assembly.
